title: Wills and inheritance
brief_description: Produced in response to the heavy demand for information on this subject, “Wills and inheritance” examines various aspects of the legal process involved in making wills. Often misunderstood, this important subject effects us all. In documentary style, experts in the field explain topics such as “Why make a will?”, “Contesting and changing wills”, “What happens if you don’t make a will?’, “How to make a valid will”, “The processes of probate”, and “Cultural considerations.”
